title: Russia's Eurasia Drilling Co says deal with Schlumberger is off
text:
Published By: Reuters - Company News - Today 
Sept 30 (Reuters) - Russia's Eurasia Drilling Company said on Wednesday that a deal with U.S.-based Schlumberger to sell a minority stake in... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
